sentences.sContent: The petrel came winnowing in from afar on the sea.
sentences.sContent_eng: The petrel came winnowing in from afar on the sea.
sentences.sCn: 海燕从海上遥远的地方振翅飞来。

sentences.sContent: Footage also showed mice devouring Atlantic petrel and great shearwater chicks.
sentences.sContent_eng: Footage also showed mice devouring Atlantic petrel and great shearwater chicks.
sentences.sCn: 画面还显示，老鼠吞噬大西洋海燕和大海鸥类飞鸟的幼雏。

trans.tranOther: a black and white sea bird
